standard.description: These are standards to maintain Accessibility.

test.test_name: Classic Columns with images have alt text
test.query_clob:
with std as (select case
                     when format_mask like 'IMAGE%' 
                     then 'N' 
                     when (coalesce((length(trim(lower(HTML_EXPRESSION))) - length(replace(trim(lower(HTML_EXPRESSION)),'<img',null)))/4, length(trim(lower(HTML_EXPRESSION))), 0) > 
                          coalesce((length(trim(lower(HTML_EXPRESSION))) - length(replace(trim(lower(HTML_EXPRESSION)),'alt="',null)))/5, length(trim(lower(HTML_EXPRESSION))), 0)) or
                          replace(trim(lower(HTML_EXPRESSION)),' ','') like '%alt=""%' or
                          trim(lower(HTML_EXPRESSION)) like '% alt %' 
                     then 'N' 
                     else 'Y'
                     end pass_yn,
                   HTML_EXPRESSION src,
                   application_id,application_name,page_id,page_name,region_id,region_name, column_alias,
                   last_updated_by, last_updated_on, build_option, heading, region_report_column_id,
						       workspace
            from apex_application_page_rpt_cols a
            where (format_mask like 'IMAGE%' or
                   trim(lower(HTML_EXPRESSION)) like '%<img%'))
select std.pass_yn,                          
       std.application_id, 
       std.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       std.last_updated_by,
       std.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Classic Report Column `%0` (app %1, page %2) has an image with missing alt text: `%3`', 
        p0 => std.heading, 
        p1 => std.application_id,
        p2 => std.page_id,
				p3 => std.src) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Classic Report Column `%0` (app %1, page %2) has an image with missing alt text', 
        p0 => std.heading, 
        p1 => std.application_id,
        p2 => std.page_id) issue_title,
       std.region_report_column_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       std.heading,
			 std.src,
			 std.workspace
from std
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = std.page_id and aap.application_id = std.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = std.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = std.application_id
where std.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
test.explanation:
This test is tied to the following WCAG Codes :

1.  1.1.1(A) : Non-text Content:  
    All non-text content that is presented to the user has a text alternative that serves the equivalent purpose, except for the situations listed below.
